Class AbstractCache

AbstractCache

public abstract class AbstractCache

Base class for cache driver implementations.

/Doctrine/Common/Cache/AbstractCache.php at line 193

_doContains

protected abstract boolean _doContains(string id)

Test if an entry exists in the cache.

Parameters:
id - cache id The cache id of the entry to check for.
Returns:
TRUE if a cache entry exists for the given cache id, FALSE otherwise.
/Doctrine/Common/Cache/AbstractCache.php at line 211

_doDelete

protected abstract boolean _doDelete(string id)

Deletes a cache entry.

Parameters:
id - cache id
Returns:
TRUE if the cache entry was successfully deleted, FALSE otherwise.
/Doctrine/Common/Cache/AbstractCache.php at line 185

_doFetch

protected abstract string _doFetch(string id)

Fetches an entry from the cache.

Parameters:
id - cache id The id of the cache entry to fetch.
Returns:
The cached data or FALSE, if no cache entry exists for the given id.
/Doctrine/Common/Cache/AbstractCache.php at line 203

_doSave

protected abstract boolean _doSave(string id, string data, int lifeTime)

Puts data into the cache.

Parameters:
id - The cache id.
data - The cache entry/data.
lifeTime - The lifetime. If != false, sets a specific lifetime for this cache entry (null => infinite lifeTime).
Returns:
TRUE if the entry was successfully stored in the cache, FALSE otherwise.
